name: "STORY" OF Nth ROOM
description:
It's documentary game of Korean Nth Room case. The case shocked me, and I hope this game can remind girls to be careful because danger is everywhere. 

Players can find some interactive details in the room about "GodGod", the owner of Nth room. He is a excellent student in university but with Disgusting thoughts.

screaming sounds in it.

And I use a galaxy skybox. when players leave the room, they will see the video screen and stars. That's because i hope people realize that there are eyes laying on them. Don't be fool. 

 "There are only two things in the world that deserve our deep admiration. One is the brilliant starry sky above us, and the other is the lofty moral law in our hearts."
